description:
It's the most important conversation in your career.

The job interview.

Learn how to tell your story in a way that's clear, concise and engaging, with instruction from the US National Elevator Pitch Champion. As a career coach, Chris Westfall has helped thousands of students, managers, entrepreneurs and executives to create powerful career conversations. From accountants to z-wave technologists, he's helped people to overcome their nerves, accelerate the conversation, and transform their careers - using the strategies outlined in this course! Whether you're starting out or seeking a six-figure executive role, you will find new ideas and new approaches on the other side! Here's what you can expect:

  • over 70 minutes of one-on-one video coaching with career expert, Chris Westfall (the author of BulletProof Branding and The NEW Elevator Pitch)
  • targeted instruction that goes beyond the basics - find out how to answer the really tough questions!
  • how to prepare for the interview, so you can present your story with confidence
  • change the interview from a one-sided interrogation into a conversation
  • build rapport and relate to the interviewer
  • how to prove you're a strong candidate, without being pushy, phony, or fake
  • learn how to overcome the negatives in your past - if you have little or no experience - or if you've got some experience that you wish you didn't - then this is the course for you!
  • be confident about telling your story, especially when the stakes are high
  • demonstrate how you can make a difference for the employer
  • find out where you stand in the interview
  • negotiate your salary like a pro
  • several bonus materials: including How to Ask for a Raise, plus written materials to reinforce the videos

It's all here - expert advice, easy-to-watch videos, and clear instruction - and not a lot of overwhelming info! Take your story to the next level, with an internationally-recognized expert, who's focused on your success. This course represents the kind of quality you've come to expect from Udemy - and the kind of results you expect for yourself. Why not take the next step, and get closer to your dream job today?
title: Job Interview Skills: Ace the Interview, Land the Job
